Class Product

java.lang.Object
com.greengrocer.models.Product
public class Product extends Object
Represents a product (vegetable or fruit) in the Greengrocer system. Products have prices that double when stock falls below threshold.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product()
      Default constructor.

    • Product

      public Product(String name, String type, double price, double stock, double threshold)
      Constructor with basic product info.
      Parameters:
      name - Product name
      type - Product type (VEGETABLE or FRUIT)
      price - Base price per kg
      stock - Current stock in kg
      threshold - Stock threshold for price doubling

    • Product

      public Product(int id, String name, String type, double price, double stock, double threshold, byte[] image)
      Full constructor with all fields.
      Parameters:
      id - Product ID
      name - Product name
      type - Product type
      price - Base price per kg
      stock - Current stock in kg
      threshold - Stock threshold
      image - Product image bytes

      Returns:
      The image as byte array

    • getDisplayPrice

      public double getDisplayPrice()
      Gets the displayed price considering threshold. If stock is at or below threshold, price is doubled.
      Returns:
      The effective price to display to customer

    • isLowStock

      public boolean isLowStock()
      Checks if stock is at or below threshold (low stock).
      Returns:
      true if low stock, false otherwise

    • isVegetable

      public boolean isVegetable()
      Checks if this is a vegetable.
      Returns:
      true if vegetable, false otherwise

    • isFruit

      public boolean isFruit()
      Checks if this is a fruit.
      Returns:
      true if fruit, false otherwise
